name: LEGO brick 2016 palette
author: Polyducks
description:
All
 available LEGO brick colours from 2016. These are colours for opaque 
bricks only. The transparent bricks are the same as opaque 
only...transparent.A palette taken from the 2016 interior memo from LEGO as listed here: https://brickset.com/colours
 . This is a direct 1:1 copy from the memo, including the metalic and 
glow-in-the-dark colours. These are listed last as #e4edce, #42433e, 
#c39738 and #878c8f
